ingredients.ingredient: 1 French baguette, cut into diagonal 1/2 inch slices

cookingTips: Slice baguette on a diagonal to maximize surface area for crisping
Brush oil lightly to avoid greasy crisps—too much oil prevents crispness
Watch oven carefully as these toast quickly and can burn in moments
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through achieving the perfect golden, crispy texture and explain why fresh Parmigiano-Reggiano makes all the difference.
